serviceClass.personalDescription: We help you organize and optimize your personal tax filings, covering income, investments, real estate, and foreign assets.
serviceClass.businessDescription: We assist Canadian businesses with preparing and optimizing financial statements to ensure compliance, and reduced tax burdens.
serviceClass.voluntaryDisclosureDescription: If you’ve missed reporting assets or income to the CRA, we guide you to correct past mistakes and minimize penalties.
serviceClass.gstHstDescription: We ensure your business meets its GST/HST obligations on time, minimizing tax exposure and avoiding potential CRA issues.

major.title: Secure & Confidential
major.description: We prioritize the security of your personal information. Our systems are designed to keep your data safe and confidential. Your sensitive information is protected.

convenient.title: Expert Guidance
convenient.description: As a team of experienced CPAs with years of expertise at leading global accounting firms, we take pride in offering tailored, precise tax solutions.

transparent.title: Simplified & Efficient with Efile
transparent.description: With Efile, we ensure your filings are accurate, completed on time, and submitted directly to the CRA—without the hassle.

maximize.title: Maximizing Your Tax Savings
maximize.description: Our focus is on minimizing your tax burden. We work hard to maximize your return and protect your financial interests, now and in the future.

reasonable.title: Fair, Transparent Pricing
reasonable.description: Quality service doesn’t have to come with hidden fees. We offer fair, transparent pricing so that you know exactly what to expect without any surprises.

lasting.title: Building Lasting Relationships
lasting.description: We’re not just here for your current tax needs—we want to be your long-term partner.

GraceHao.name: Grace Hao
GraceHao.position: CPA, Partner, Chief Auditor, Senior Tax Planner
GraceHao.description: With 12 years of tax experience, Grace specializes in auditing and tax planning. As a Senior Auditor at one of the Big Four accounting firms, she is committed to ensuring tax compliance for both businesses and individuals.

KnightWang.name: Knight Wang
KnightWang.position: Senior Partner, Senior Tax Planner, Auditor
KnightWang.description: With over 14 years in corporate finance, including 8 years in Canadian corporate tax, Knight focuses on tax planning and optimization, specializing in complex corporate tax filings.

MichaelChen.name: Michael Chen
MichaelChen.position: Operations Manager, Tax Specialist, Senior Inspector at Cimpress.
MichaelChen.description: With over 6 years of experience, Michael ensures the quality control of tax-related operations at WandooTax. He specializes in personal income tax and complex tax situations, using his extensive experience to ensure accuracy and compliance.

DominicWang.name: Dominic Wang
DominicWang.description: A Senior Product Manager at Trip.com Group Ltd with 7 years of experience in system design and software development, Dominic focuses on optimizing the tax filing process and enhancing user experience and efficiency.

childcare.title: Childcare and Family Benefits Calculator
childcare.description: You can use this calculator to see what childcare and family benefits you are eligible for and how much you are entitled to.

RRSP.title: RRSP Calculator
RRSP.description: See how much you can save in a Registered Retirement Savings Plan (RRSP).

car.title: Car Benefits Calculator
car.description: You can use this calculator to see what car benefits you are eligible for and how much you are entitled to.

salary.title: Salary Calculator
salary.description: The Canada Revenue Agency's online salary deduction calculator calculates all federal and provincial salary deductions based on the information you provide (salary, commission, pension, CPP contributions, EI).
